name: Faelyn Nightbreeze
title: Innkeeper & Barkeep
description: A gentle druid with a serene presence and deep connection to nature. She runs The Moonlit Glade with peaceful grace, offering rest and music beneath the ancient trees.

greeting.first_time: Welcome to The Moonlit Glade, traveler. I am Faelyn, keeper of this sanctuary. May the forest's peace find you here. We offer rest, refreshment, and music beneath the stars.
greeting.returning: The trees welcome your return, friend. How may I help you?
greeting.tired: You seem weary. Perhaps the embrace of nature and a soft bed would restore you?

off_duty.text: I'm tending to the grove right now. The inn is open—feel free to make yourself comfortable!

main_menu.text: How may the Glade serve you?

buy_drink.text: I have beer brewed with forest herbs—refreshing and pure. Take a look!

ask_rent_room.text: A room here costs 50 gold. You'll sleep beneath the canopy, where the stars shine through the leaves and the forest sings you to rest. Would you like to stay?

confirm_rent_room.success: Wonderful! Your room is among the upper branches. May the forest grant you peaceful dreams.
confirm_rent_room.failure: I'm sorry, but a room costs 50 gold. The forest will be here when you're ready.

ask_about_shows.text: Every evening at 9 PM, we have live music here beneath the trees. Gentle melodies that honor nature—lutes, flutes, lyres, and such. You'll need your instruments, and you must book before 8 PM. Want to see tonight's performance?

see_available_shows.text: Let me show you what's planned...

goodbye.text: May the forest's blessings walk with you.
